title: what are some bannable words/phrases?
body: other than hurting someone's feelings, what are some bannable words/phrases?

replies.body:
https://i.imgur.com/6C5mv4K.jpg[/img]

On the off chance you're being genuinely curious:

* racism
* sexism
* homophobia
* ethnic or nationalist slurs
* encouraging or reveling in self-harm
* harassment
* indicating that you intend to feed, throw the game or go AFK
* calling someone stupid (or using other words that mean effectively the same thing)
* telling someone they don't know how to play

and last, but not least:

* any language that tends to or is intended to insult, provoke or denigrate

Hope that helps!
literally according to this post, 4 people in every single match i have played since coming back need to be banned. something is really wrong with the banning system

Not necessarily. Those things _can lead to a ban_, but there's a certain amount of flexibility built into the system. Riot's statistics show that the majority of toxicity comes from people who are normally not toxic, but are having a bad day (something like 60%, at last mention).

You have to understand that the IFS is based on what is almost certainly the largest gaming behavior data set in existence. Having access to that data allows them to predict pretty well who needs a wake up call and who doesn't.

That's why there isn't anywhere near a 100% ban rate.
